DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to investigate wether the adjuvant (postoperative) administration of acetazolamide can improve the surgical results after uvulopalatopharyngoplasty in patients with mild sleep apnea.
DOC.brief_title: A Combined Surgical and Medical Approach in Mild Sleep Apnea
